post-fetch-error: An error occurred while fetching the post
posts-fetch-error: An error occurred while fetching the posts
post-create-error: An error occurred while creating the post
user-fetch-error: An error occurred while fetching the user
user-update-error: An error occurred while updating the user
users-fetch-error: An error occurred while fetching the users
comments-fetch-error: An error occurred while fetching the comments
comment-create-error: An error occurred while creating the comment
comment-remove-error: An error occurred while removing the comment
followers-fetch-error: An error occurred while fetching the followers
like-comment-error: An error occurred while liking the comment
unable-to-follow: An error occurred while trying to follow the user
unable-to-unfollow: An error occurred while trying to unfollow the user
counts-fetch-error: An error occurred while fetching the followers counts
